paramInformation.label: HVAC System Type
paramInformation.description: Configures the type of heating system used.

paramInformation.label: Calibration Temperature
paramInformation.description: Allowable range: -10 to 10 in 1 °F increments.

paramInformation.label: Calibration Temperature Precision
paramInformation.description: The 'precision' part of a z-wave float representing this parameter. This is the number of decimal digits included in the temperature value. For example with a precision of 1, a value of 15 represents 1.5 °F

paramInformation.label: Calibration Temperature Scale
paramInformation.description: The 'scale' part of a z-wave float representing this parameter

paramInformation.label: Calibration Temperature Size
paramInformation.description: The 'size' part of a z-wave float representing this parameter, in bytes

paramInformation.label: Overshoot
paramInformation.description: Allowable range: 0 to 3 in 0.5 °F increments.

paramInformation.label: Overshoot Precision
paramInformation.description: The 'precision' part of a z-wave float representing this parameter. This is the number of decimal digits included in the temperature value. For example with a precision of 1, a value of 15 represents 1.5 °F

paramInformation.label: Overshoot Scale
paramInformation.description: The 'scale' part of a z-wave float representing this parameter

paramInformation.label: Overshoot Size
paramInformation.description: The 'size' part of a z-wave float representing this parameter, in bytes

paramInformation.label: Swing
paramInformation.description: Allowable range: 0 to 3 in 0.5 °F increments.

paramInformation.label: Swing Precision
paramInformation.description: The 'precision' part of a z-wave float representing this parameter. This is the number of decimal digits included in the temperature value. For example with a precision of 1, a value of 15 represents 1.5 °F

paramInformation.label: Swing Scale
paramInformation.description: The 'scale' part of a z-wave float representing this parameter

paramInformation.label: Swing Size
paramInformation.description: The 'size' part of a z-wave float representing this parameter, in bytes

paramInformation.label: Balance Setpoint
paramInformation.description: Allowable range: 0 to 95 in 1 °F increments.

paramInformation.label: Balance Setpoint Precision
paramInformation.description: The 'precision' part of a z-wave float representing this parameter. This is the number of decimal digits included in the temperature value. For example with a precision of 1, a value of 15 represents 1.5 °F

paramInformation.label: Balance Setpoint Scale
paramInformation.description: The 'scale' part of a z-wave float representing this parameter

paramInformation.label: Balance Setpoint Size
paramInformation.description: The 'size' part of a z-wave float representing this parameter, in bytes

paramInformation.label: Recovery Settings
paramInformation.description: Whether thermostat uses intelligence to try and make the best of energy usage.

paramInformation.label: Maximum Heat Setpoint
paramInformation.description: Allowable range: 35 to 95 in 1 °F increments.

paramInformation.label: Maximum Heat Setpoint Precision
paramInformation.description: The 'precision' part of a z-wave float representing this parameter. This is the number of decimal digits included in the temperature value. For example with a precision of 1, a value of 15 represents 1.5 °F

paramInformation.label: Maximum Heat Setpoint Scale
paramInformation.description: The 'scale' part of a z-wave float representing this parameter

paramInformation.label: Maximum Heat Setpoint Size
paramInformation.description: The 'size' part of a z-wave float representing this parameter, in bytes

paramInformation.label: Minimum Heat Setpoint
paramInformation.description: Allowable range: 35 to 95 in 1 °F increments.

paramInformation.label: Minimum Heat Setpoint Precision
paramInformation.description: The 'precision' part of a z-wave float representing this parameter. This is the number of decimal digits included in the temperature value. For example with a precision of 1, a value of 15 represents 1.5 °F

paramInformation.label: Minimum Heat Setpoint Scale
paramInformation.description: The 'scale' part of a z-wave float representing this parameter

paramInformation.label: Minimum Heat Setpoint Size
paramInformation.description: The 'size' part of a z-wave float representing this parameter, in bytes

paramInformation.label: Maximum Cool Setpoint
paramInformation.description: Allowable range: 50 to 95 in 1 °F increments.

paramInformation.label: Maximum Cool Setpoint Precision
paramInformation.description: The 'precision' part of a z-wave float representing this parameter. This is the number of decimal digits included in the temperature value. For example with a precision of 1, a value of 15 represents 1.5 °F

paramInformation.label: Maximum Cool Setpoint Size
paramInformation.description: The 'size' part of a z-wave float representing this parameter, in bytes

paramInformation.label: Thermostat Lock
paramInformation.description: Lock out physical thermostat controls.

paramInformation.label: HVAC Modes Enabled
paramInformation.description: Which heating/cooling modes are available.

options.label: Off, Heat, Cool, Auto, Emergency Heat

paramInformation.label: Configurable Terminal Setting
paramInformation.description: Changes control of configurable terminal

paramInformation.label: Remote Temperature Enable
paramInformation.description: Use remote temperature sensor instead of built-in.

paramInformation.label: Heat Differential
paramInformation.description: Allowable range: 1 to 10 in 0.5 °F increments.

paramInformation.label: Heat Differential Precision
paramInformation.description: The 'precision' part of a z-wave float representing this parameter. This is the number of decimal digits included in the temperature value. For example with a precision of 1, a value of 15 represents 1.5 °F

paramInformation.description: The 'scale' part of a z-wave float representing this parameter

paramInformation.label: Heat Differential Size
paramInformation.description: The 'size' part of a z-wave float representing this parameter, in bytes

paramInformation.label: Temperature Reporting Threshold
paramInformation.description: Allowable range: 0.5 to 2 in 0.5 °F increments.

paramInformation.label: Temperature Reporting Threshold Precision
paramInformation.description: The 'precision' part of a z-wave float representing this parameter. This is the number of decimal digits included in the temperature value. For example with a precision of 1, a value of 15 represents 1.5 °F

paramInformation.description: The 'size' part of a z-wave float representing this parameter, in bytes

paramInformation.label: O/B Select
paramInformation.description: Configuration of O/B terminal.
